title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath/output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the output location and classpath, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations that should be combined into one.
SR:
1. Open the application or project.
2. Navigate to the settings or preferences section.
3. Find the option to set the output location.
4. Set the desired output location.
5. Find the option to set the classpath.
6. Set the classpath.
7. Press Ok or any similar confirm button.
8. Verify that the operation completes successfully without any error messages.
